-Knowledge and understanding of governmental accounting principles and auditing procedures and practices.-Knowledge and understanding of the types of audit evidence and the appropriate use of each.-Perform and document tests of financial and compliance controls.-Perform and document tests of account balances.-Develop audit findings and prepare drafts to be included in audit reports.

-Market-wide range of Coca-Cola products to convenient retail industry.-Execute and close all sales calls for assigned accounts.-Sell in incremental displays and equipment placements.-Sell in promotional programs and ensure customer compliance.-Inventory management.-Maintain point of sale.-Ensure account meets Company merchandising standards.-Able to determine product needs for each account.-Place and transmit appropriate order in conjunction with existing geographic sales routes

-Promoted from inside sales team to outside sales team.-In charge of accounts nationwide.-Assist customers with purchase of Oracle.-Travel to customer sites.-Work with vendor to promote product to resellers.

-Traveled to customer sites to train customers on vendor policies.-Worked with vendors reps to create presentation to fit customer’s needs.-Trained new team members on Oracle and Agilysys applications and procedures.-Agilysys Circle of Excellence Winner 2005.

-Act as a liaison between product vendor, outside sales representatives and product resellers.-Handle major accounts within assigned territories.-Full knowledge of product line, ability to quote pricing, and communicate with partners. -Work alongside members of inside sales team to close business deals in a timely manner.-Handle heavy incoming call volume to assist customer’s needs. -Track and place orders using vendor web pages and Excel.-Processed contracts for partner membership renewals and daily orders.

Todd was our account rep at Agilysys for several years. We are an Oracle reseller, Agilysys was our distributor, and Todd was our connection to Oracle. For licensing, pricing, financing, and “how do we structure the deal” questions, we went to Todd. He would either have the answer, find the answer, or direct us to someone who would have the answer. From speaking with others at Agilysys, I know Todd was also the guy they went to for answers. He was quick, creative, accurate, and reliable. He proactively provided information to help us conduct business, and was always that calm presence on the other end of the line.
